controllers

Class ApplicationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.ApplicationHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class ApplicationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Handler of this app which coordinates all actions according to the current state of the system
    Author:
    Xavier Bouchenard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • ApplicationHandler

        public ApplicationHandler(java.lang.String address,
                          int port,
                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Float,java.util.ArrayList<Course>>> map,
                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> urls)
        Constructor of the ApplicationHandler class
        Parameters:
        address - IP Address of the host machine
        port - Input listen port of the TCP server
        map - List of courses sorted by department name
        urls - List of URLs to join the ADE file related to the department timetable

        Parameters:
